sentences.en: 'Well then, I'll tell you,'said Stryver, coming slowly into a sitting posture.
sentences.cn: “ 那好, 那我就告评你, ”斯特莱佛慢慢坐起身来说.

sentences.en: An observant doctor can often detect depression from expression, posture, and movement.
sentences.cn: 善于观察的医生常常能从人的表情、姿势以及动作诊察出抑郁症。

sentences.en: Exercise, fresh air, and good posture are all helpful.
sentences.cn: 锻炼、新鲜空气和好的坐立姿势都很有益。

sentences.en: Good posture also helps your bust look bigger.
sentences.cn: 优美的姿势也能让你的胸部看起来更丰满。

sentences.en: He assumed a posture and began to sing a part in a Beijing opera.
sentences.cn: 他拉开架子,唱起了京剧.

sentences.en: He bade us keep in a ready posture.
He bid us keep in a ready posture.
He tore off his coat and assumed a fighting posture.
sentences.cn: 他脱掉上衣,摆出一副打架的架势.

sentences.en: If bad posture becomes habitual, you risk long-term effects.
sentences.cn: 不良姿势一旦定型，日后可就有你受的了。

sentences.en: Poor posture can cause neck ache, headaches and breathing problems.
sentences.cn: 姿势不当会导致颈部疼痛、头痛和呼吸困难。

sentences.en: Poor posture, sitting or walking slouched over, compresses the body's organs.
sentences.cn: 坐着或者走路的时候低头垂肩，这种不正确的姿势会压迫体内的器官。

sentences.en: She says the president may just be posturing.
sentences.cn: 她说总统也许只是在作态。

sentences.en: Sit in a relaxed upright posture.
Such single - function applications have a posture of their own, the transient posture.
sentences.cn: 并且不应该表现出独占式的行为,这样单一功能的应用有其自己的暂时姿态.

sentences.en: They are trying to adopt a more cooperative posture.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图采取更为合作的态度.

sentences.en: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture.
sentences.cn: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。
